snippet: Atlanta moved the ball effectively and beat Washington, which was again without the injured John Wall. Paul Pierce missed a 3-point attempt that would have tied the score late.
abstract: Atlanta Hawks beat Washington Wizards, 106-101, tying NBA playoff series at two games apiece.
lead_paragraph: Atlanta moved the ball effectively and beat Washington, which was again without the injured John Wall. Paul Pierce missed a 3-point attempt that would have tied the score late.

headline.main: Hawks Regain Offensive Flow, and Pierce Can’t Save Wizards
headline.print_headline: Hawks Regain Offensive Flow and Get Even With Wizards
